page.title: 13Supernatural.
page.content: Although there are not so many sightings today we believe{ghosts}are just as abundant now as in the past. In our area probably the most famous haunting is that of{the 400 year old {school house at Netherthorpe.} The ghost is supposedly of{an old master who hung himself in a bedroom in the house. The old master's ghost is supposed to make wailing noises and pace up and down with a rope round his neck. Our information shows that the ghost appears around 5.00.-7.00pm but there is no regularity of appearances. Another ghost in this area is the one that haunts the{White House}near Woodthorpe school. The ghost belongs to{an old lady}who spent the last years of her life in the house. { (But do ghosts really exist in 1985?) By Kirstie Brown & Georgina Pearson.
